entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Key Lake Airport 11:36 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.4°C
Pressure: 98.6 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.5°C
Wind: E 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
